unnormalised: Thinking of going solar, Chennai? The government's doling out some serious cash incentives for rooftop solar installations and you DON'T want to miss out!
normalised: Thinking of going solar, Chennai? The government is doling out some serious cash incentives for rooftop solar installations and you do not want to miss out!

unnormalised: Word on the street is, subsidies are available up to 40% for systems up to 3kW. That could save you a whole lotta rupees! Imagine, free electricity powering your fans during the scorching summer heat.
normalised: Word on the street is, subsidies are available up to forty percent for systems up to three kilowatt. That could save you a whole lotta rupees! Imagine, free electricity powering your fans during the scorching summer heat.

unnormalised: Heard aunty Radha in Madurai got her entire house kitted out and is now basically energy independent. Talk about Lakshmi (prosperity) smiling on her!
normalised: Heard aunty Radha in Madurai got her entire house kitted out and is now basically energy independent. Talk about Lakshmi (prosperity) smiling on her!

unnormalised: These subsidies are part of the "Surya Ghar Yojana," pushing for cleaner energy across India. Think lower electricity bills and feeling good about helping the environment – what's not to love?
normalised: These subsidies are part of the "Surya Ghar Yojana," pushing for cleaner energy across India. Think lower electricity bills and feeling good about helping the environment – what is not to love?

unnormalised: Plus, picture this: enjoying a plate of steaming hot biryani, powered by the sun's free energy. Doesn't that sound delightful?
normalised: Plus, picture this: enjoying a plate of steaming hot biryani, powered by the sun's free energy. Does not that sound delightful?

unnormalised: But hurry, these subsidies are like hot jalebis – they disappear fast! Contact your local DISCOM (distribution company) or check out MNRE's website for details and application forms. Deadline's looming, so get cracking! Start planning your energy independence journey today!
normalised: But hurry, these subsidies are like hot jalebis – they disappear fast! Contact your local D I S C O M (distribution company) or check out M N R E's website for details and application forms. Deadline is looming, so get cracking! Start planning your energy independence journey today!
